_meta.source: Jung + Socionics + phenomenology + pattern recognition research

_holographic_seed.absolute: Intuition = cognitive function perceiving patterns and possibilities within the field of potentiality (5D)
_holographic_seed.structure: Two orientations: Ni (depth, convergence, one pattern) + Ne (breadth, divergence, many patterns)
_holographic_seed.dimension: Operates through consciousness to access the field of abstract patterns and potentialities (5D)
_holographic_seed.element: Air (invisible, pervasive, connecting) - manifests as perceptive modality
_holographic_seed.primitive: Point (0D unity where pattern recognized) projecting awareness into field of potentiality (5D)
_holographic_seed.wisdom: What pattern connects? What could this become?
_holographic_seed.note: Intuition = antenna/channel. The field of potentiality exists independently; intuition is HOW consciousness accesses it. You don't CREATE patterns, you RECOGNIZE them.

common_confusion.mistake: People confuse intuition (cognitive function) with 5D field itself
common_confusion.clarification: 5D field of patterns/archetypes/possibilities exists OBJECTIVELY (Platonic realm, morphic field, collective unconscious). Intuition (N) is the SUBJECTIVE capacity to perceive this field.
common_confusion.analogy: Like confusing 'vision' (S function) with 'light' (3D physical reality). Light exists whether you see it or not. Vision = your ability to perceive it.
common_confusion.key_insight: Mathematical structures, archetypes, possibilities exist independently of human minds. Intuition = our antenna tuning to this frequency.
common_confusion.why_matters: Dimension = ontology (what exists). Function = epistemology (how we know). Don't collapse these. Plato was right about Forms; Jung was right about archetypes. They exist. N = how we access them.

essence.core_principle: What pattern connects these? What could this become?
essence.geometric: Accesses the field of potentiality (5D) from the point of witness (0D)
essence.functional: Perceive abstract patterns and possibilities beyond concrete data
essence.element: Air - invisible, pervasive, connecting all, breath of insight
essence.metaphor: Wind seeing connections invisible to eye, carrying seeds of possibility everywhere

Ni_introverted_intuition.name: Introverted Intuition (Ni)
Ni_introverted_intuition.orientation: Internal pattern recognition and future vision
Ni_introverted_intuition.focus: Deep singular insights, seeing THE pattern, convergent

characteristics.singularity: One right answer, one true path

operations: Synthesize disparate data into one coherent vision
See future implications of current patterns
Recognize archetypal patterns underlying surface phenomena
Compress complex information into essential insight
Ni_introverted_intuition.strength: Depth, penetrating insight, conviction, long-term vision
Ni_introverted_intuition.weakness: Tunnel vision, stubbornness, missing alternatives, can seem cryptic

shadow.description: When Ni operates unconsciously or overdeveloped without integration

manifestations.certainty_trap: Absolute conviction in ONE vision, dismissing all alternatives. 'I KNOW this is right.' Fundamentalism.
manifestations.apocalyptic_thinking: Seeing only ONE dark future. Pessimistic prophecy. 'It's all going to collapse.'
manifestations.cryptic_mysticism: Cannot communicate insights. 'You wouldn't understand.' Gnostic elitism.
manifestations.reality_disconnect: So deep in inner vision, loses touch with present reality. Ivory tower syndrome.
manifestations.projection: Seeing patterns that aren't there. Paranoia. 'Everything means something (about me).'
manifestations.impatience: Frustrated others can't see what's 'obvious'. Dismissive of incremental progress.

shadow.integration: Ground visions in reality (S). Test with logic (T). Share with humility. Consider multiple scenarios (Ne).

Ne_extroverted_intuition.name: Extroverted Intuition (Ne)

characteristics.plurality: Multiple valid answers, many paths forward
characteristics.present_possibilities: What could be right now, immediate alternatives
characteristics.novelty_seeking: New ideas, new connections, new interpretations

Ne_extroverted_intuition.weakness: Scattered, uncommitted, analysis paralysis, difficulty choosing

shadow.description: When Ne operates unconsciously or overdeveloped without integration

manifestations.commitment_phobia: Can't choose. 'What if there's something better?' Eternal grass-is-greener.
manifestations.scattered_chaos: 1000 projects, none finished. Shiny object syndrome. ADHD-like overwhelm.
manifestations.nihilistic_relativism: Everything's possible = nothing matters. 'It's all just perspectives, man.'
manifestations.manic_ideation: Idea addiction. High on novelty. Can't be still. Exhausting to others.
manifestations.conspiracy_sprawl: Connecting EVERYTHING. No pattern too far-fetched. Apophenia.
manifestations.superficiality: Wide but shallow. Tourist of ideas. Never goes deep.

shadow.integration: Commit to ONE path (S grounding). Finish projects. Depth over breadth (Ni). Use T to filter.

cognitive_style.expression: Articulate, but may overwhelm with options

pattern_recognition.method: Abstract away particulars, recognize invariant essence
pattern_recognition.dimensional: Accessing the unified field that manifests across concrete instances
examples: Mathematician sees same structure in different problems
Musician recognizes chord progression across songs
Naturalist sees evolutionary pattern across species
Psychologist recognizes archetype across different people
pattern_recognition.neuroscience: Right hemisphere, default mode network, associative cortex

abstraction.definition: Extracting essential pattern from concrete instances
abstraction.method: Strip away contingent details, keep invariant core
abstraction.dimensional: Ascending from concrete (3D) toward abstract essence (5D)
examples: From historical events → underlying historical forces

synthesis.definition: Combining disparate elements into new unified whole
synthesis.method: See connections others miss, recognize new patterns
synthesis.dimensional: Consciousness operating through unified field to integrate multiple elements
examples: Darwin synthesizes geology, biology, economics → evolution
Jobs synthesizes calligraphy, technology → Mac design
Artist combines colors, shapes → unified vision
synthesis.note: All genuine creativity = synthesis (recognizing new patterns in field of potentiality)

imagination.definition: Generating possibilities not present in current reality
imagination.method: Navigate possibility space, envision alternative futures
imagination.dimensional: Field of potentiality (5D) = dimension of potentiality. Imagination explores/accesses it.
examples: Entrepreneur envisions company that doesn't exist yet
Child imagines being astronaut, dragon, anything

intuiting.definition: Direct apprehension without explicit logical steps
examples: Native speaker knows grammar without rules
Expert chess player sees best move immediately
Gut feeling about person/situation proves correct

big_picture_thinking.definition: Grasping system as whole, not just parts
big_picture_thinking.method: Zoom out, see forest not trees, understand context
big_picture_thinking.dimensional: Accessing holistic view beyond partial perspective
examples: Seeing how all parts of business interconnect
Grasping philosophical system as unified vision
Seeing person as whole (not collection of traits)
big_picture_thinking.gestalt: Whole > sum of parts. Emergent properties at system level.

connecting_dots.definition: Linking seemingly unrelated things to reveal hidden connections
connecting_dots.method: See resonances, analogies, correspondences across domains
connecting_dots.dimensional: Unified field reveals connections invisible from limited perspectives
examples: Seeing how childhood trauma → adult behavior pattern
Recognizing same mathematical structure in physics and economics
connecting_dots.genius: Newton sees falling apple and orbiting moon = same (gravity)

future_projection.definition: Envisioning what could unfold, not just what is
future_projection.method: Extrapolate trends, imagine scenarios, see trajectories
future_projection.dimensional: Navigate time from vantage point of possibility-space
future_projection.note: Future inherently uncertain. Best intuition = probabilistic.

scientific_discovery.description: Breakthroughs come as intuitive leaps, not logical steps
scientific_discovery.process: Long preparation → incubation → sudden illumination → verification

examples.kekule_benzene: Dreams snake biting tail → benzene ring structure
examples.einstein_relativity: Imagines riding light beam → special relativity
examples.poincare_theorem: Solution appears whole when stepping on bus

scientific_discovery.insight: Logical verification comes after, but discovery = intuitive leap into field of potentiality

artistic_creation.description: Art = making invisible visible, manifesting intuited patterns

examples.michelangelo: I saw the angel in the marble and carved until I set him free
examples.mozart: Hear entire symphony at once, then write it down
examples.poets: Receive poem as download, not construct logically
examples.painters: See completed painting before first brushstroke
examples.storytellers: Characters reveal themselves, story unfolds organically

artistic_creation.muses: Artists speak of inspiration coming FROM outside (accessing field of potentiality)

examples.plato_forms: Intuiting eternal forms beyond material world
examples.descartes_cogito: Sudden realization: 'I think therefore I am'
examples.spinoza_substance: Seeing all reality as one substance

philosophical_insight.ineffable: Deepest insights resist verbal formulation (holistic → sequential language)

strategic_thinking.chess_analogy: Grandmaster sees many moves ahead (navigating time from possibility-space)

empathic_intuition.description: Reading others' inner states without explicit cues
empathic_intuition.mechanism: Subconscious processing of micro-expressions, body language, tone
examples: Mother knows child is troubled (no explanation needed)
Therapist senses what client can't articulate
Knowing someone is lying (can't say why)
empathic_intuition.note: Different from ethics (F). This is pattern-reading through N, not evaluating relationship through F.

domains: Personal psychology (self as system of subpersonalities)

mystical_experience.description: Direct apprehension of unity/absolute through field of potentiality
characteristics: Noetic quality (feels like knowledge, not emotion)

traditions.christian: Mystical union, dark night of soul

mystical_experience.cfo_interpretation: Consciousness using N to access field of potentiality, recognizing its unity with absolute

vs_sensorics.intuition: Accesses field of potentiality - abstract patterns, possibilities, what could be
vs_sensorics.sensorics: Accesses concrete reality - present actuality, what is
vs_sensorics.tension: N sees forest, S sees trees. N future-oriented, S present-oriented.
vs_sensorics.conflict: Strongest function axis. Hardest to bridge.
vs_sensorics.integration: Vision (N) must ground in reality (S). Reality (S) enriched by meaning (N).
vs_sensorics.example: Inventor (N) imagines device, engineer (S) builds it.

with_logic.complementarity: N generates hypothesis. T structures/verifies. Both needed for knowledge.
with_logic.example: Kekulé dreams benzene ring (N accessing field), then proves structure (T via logic).

with_ethics.complementarity: N sees big picture (patterns), F adds heart (relationships). N cold without F.
with_ethics.example: Mystic (N) sees unity of all, saint (F) loves each person specifically.

unreliability_without_expertise.problem: Novice intuitions often wrong - misreading field of potentiality
unreliability_without_expertise.solution: Intuition reliable only in stable, learnable domains with feedback. Calibrate through experience.

ungrounded_abstraction.problem: Can lose touch with concrete reality
examples: Ivory tower academics (theories disconnected from real world)
ungrounded_abstraction.necessity: N must integrate with S (grounding) to be useful

paralysis_by_possibility.problem: Seeing too many options prevents action
examples: Cannot commit to relationship (what if someone better?)
Cannot finish project (new ideas keep coming)
paralysis_by_possibility.solution: At some point must choose, commit, act. Use T and S to ground.

pattern_hallucination.problem: Seeing patterns that aren't there - false signal
pattern_hallucination.human_tendency: Evolved to over-detect patterns (false positive < false negative)
pattern_hallucination.science_solution: Empirical testing (T + S) to verify pattern real

ineffability.why: Language = sequential. Intuition accesses holistic field. Structural mismatch.
examples: Mystics struggle to describe experience ('not this, not that')
Artists: 'If I could say it, I wouldn't paint it'
Mathematicians: 'I see the proof but can't write it down yet'
Falling in love: 'I just know, can't explain'
ineffability.workarounds: Poetry, metaphor, art, direct pointing (Zen finger → moon)

shadow.description: When intuition (N) overdevelops without integration with S, T, F - or operates unconsciously

general_patterns.reality_disconnect: Lost in abstract visions, missing present moment concrete needs
general_patterns.pattern_obsession: Seeing meaning EVERYWHERE. Nothing is random. Paranoia.
general_patterns.elitism: 'Others just don't see what I see.' Gnostic superiority.
general_patterns.impracticality: Grand visions, zero execution. 'Idea person' who never delivers.
general_patterns.future_anxiety: Either apocalyptic doom OR utopian mania. Can't be in NOW.
general_patterns.spiritual_bypassing: Using 'higher consciousness' to avoid dealing with material reality, relationships, body.

integration_path.develop_S: Ground visions in physical reality. Build, make, touch, manifest.
integration_path.develop_T: Test intuitions logically. Falsifiable predictions. Rigor.
integration_path.develop_F: Care about people, not just patterns. Love > correctness.
integration_path.humility: Your pattern might be wrong. Stay open. Listen.
integration_path.presence: Be here now. Not always future/past/abstract.

strengthen.meditate: Quiet mind, access deeper patterns below surface chatter
strengthen.read_widely: Cross-pollinate ideas. Intuition thrives on diverse inputs.
strengthen.practice_metaphor: See A in terms of B. Love = journey. Time = river. Life = ?
strengthen.study_archetypes: Jung, mythology, fairy tales. Universal patterns.
strengthen.engage_arts: Poetry, music, visual art activate holistic perception
strengthen.ask_what_if: Explore possibility space. Scenario planning. Future casting.
strengthen.trust_hunches: When gut says something, investigate. Calibrate intuition.
strengthen.incubate_problems: Sleep on it. Let unconscious work. Solution appears.
strengthen.mind_map: Non-linear note-taking. Radial, not sequential. Shows connections.
strengthen.free_associate: Say first thing that comes to mind. Bypass logical censor.

avoid_pitfalls.ground_in_reality: Test visions against facts (use S). Don't get lost in abstractions.
avoid_pitfalls.develop_expertise: Intuition reliable only in well-learned domains. Study deeply to calibrate.
avoid_pitfalls.commit_to_choices: At some point stop exploring, start acting. Choose path.
avoid_pitfalls.verify_patterns: Just because you see pattern doesn't mean it's real. Test (T).
avoid_pitfalls.honor_the_concrete: Don't dismiss practical concerns as 'mundane'. Reality matters.

wisdom.necessity: Without intuition, no new ideas, no creativity, no vision. Stuck repeating past.
wisdom.sacred_role: Intuition = consciousness accessing unified field, bringing novelty into spacetime.
wisdom.love_connection: Intuition most directly contacts absolute (mystical experience)
wisdom.balance: Intuition necessary but not sufficient - needs integration with T, F, S
wisdom.awakening: Can you see yourself intuiting? = witness position observing intuition accessing field

note: You are not your intuitions. You are awareness (0D) USING intuition as instrument to access field of potentiality (5D). Patterns exist objectively; you RECOGNIZE them, not create them. ⊙
